Large Interaction Introduction

More overview about the interaction site and the point of it.

  • Early Mechanization

    Water wheels, along with wheels and early gears, assisted and replaced the labor of many humans and animals but didn't completely revolutionize work.

  • Steam Engine

    The invention of the steam engine kickstarted the industrial revoltion greatly augmenting and expanding the potential of physical effort.

  • Start of True Automation

    Ford Motors began fully automating tasks, with machines not only augmenting physical effort but also taking over tasks, taking in feedback, and self adjusting to feedback.

  • Beginning of Information and Robotics

    With the foundations of machinery and large scale computing, entire systems c
